location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3011 from Charles Gonne, Acting Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay Castle to Lewis Pelly, The Political Resident, Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Letter communicating the approval of the Government of India of the measures adopted by Lewis Pelly in punishing the Chiefs of Bahrein [Bahrain] and Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi].The letter refers to No.1228 of 1868 which can be found on folio 8.
